title: New Orleans Factions
description: Explore the supernatural politics of the French Quarter!

questions.question: What district is the center of supernatural power in New Orleans?
questions.explanation: The French Quarter is the heart of supernatural activity where vampires, witches, and werewolves vie for power.

questions.question: Which werewolf pack does Hayley belong to?
questions.explanation: Hayley is the last surviving member of the Labonair bloodline, royalty in the Crescent Wolf Pack.

questions.question: The witches of New Orleans practice Ancestral Magic.
questions.explanation: New Orleans witches draw power from their ancestors buried in the city, making them tied to the land.

questions.question: Who was the Harvest ritual meant to appease?
questions.explanation: The Harvest is a sacrificial ritual where four young witches die to strengthen the ancestors' power, then return.

questions.question: What is the name of the bar that serves as a supernatural hub?
questions.explanation: Rousseau's is the bar where Cami worked and where many supernatural meetings took place.

questions.question: What curse did the Crescent wolves suffer from?

options.text: They were human only on full moons

questions.explanation: The Crescent Curse forced the wolves to stay in wolf form except on full moons when they became human.

questions.question: Marcel built his vampire army from the streets of New Orleans.
questions.explanation: Marcel created his vampire empire by turning and recruiting people from the streets, building a loyal army.

questions.question: What powerful witch coven operates from the cemetery?
questions.explanation: The Nine Covens of New Orleans witches operate from the Lafayette Cemetery, where their ancestors are buried.
